name: photofield
description: Photofield is a self-hosted gallery viewer that displays images in a dynamic, zoomable canvas layout. Ideal for browsing large photo collections with intuitive navigation and a fluid UI.
features: Zoomable canvas: Display photos on an infinite, zoomable canvas for intuitive browsing of large collections.
Dynamic layout: Automatically arrange images in visually appealing layouts based on metadata and relationships.
Fast navigation: Smoothly pan and zoom through thousands of photos with hardware-accelerated rendering.
Metadata support: Display EXIF data including location, date, camera settings, and custom tags.
Timeline view: Organize photos chronologically with visual timeline navigation and date clustering.
Folder scanning: Automatically index photos from local directories with real-time updates.
Search and filter: Find photos by date, location, camera, or custom metadata fields.
Lightweight design: Minimal resource usage enables smooth performance even on low-power devices.
Keyboard shortcuts: Navigate and control the interface efficiently with customizable keyboard commands.
Responsive interface: Adapts to different screen sizes for desktop, tablet, and mobile viewing.
Privacy focused: All processing happens locally with no external services or data collection.
RAW format support: View and browse RAW image files from professional cameras alongside standard formats.
